descriptionHtml: ( this keyblade can not be forged yet.... so just do in console help blade and you should find it )The ?-blade s a legendary weapon introduced in Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep. Despite looking similar to a Keyblade, it is something \"altogether different\"; rather than being a man-made counterpart to Kingdom Hearts, it coexists with Kingdom Hearts. As such, instead of opening the door to an artificial Kingdom Hearts like the Keyblade of heart, it actually materializes the true Kingdom Hearts, a perfect union of all hearts and worlds.[citation needed] The Keyblade War occurred because of the many souls who desired to take the ?-blade and Kingdom Hearts for themselves, and Master Xehanort later enacts his plots with the same goal in mind.
author: zagar
